types:
(: Dog (-> (: $dog Object) Type))
(: Name (-> (: $named Object) (: $name String) Type))
statements:
(: dog (WithTV (Dog $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: name (WithTV (Name $a $b) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: max Object)
(: max_named_max (WithTV (Name max 'Max') (STV 1.0 1.0)))
(: max_dog (WithTV (Dog max) (STV 1.0 1.0)))

input: The red car is not faster than the blue truck.
types:
(: Vehicle (-> (: $vehicle Object) Type))
(: Car (-> (: $car Object) Type))
(: Truck (-> (: $truck Object) Type))
(: Red (-> (: $object Object) Type))
(: Blue (-> (: $object Object) Type))
(: Faster_than (-> (: $vehicle1 Object) (: $vehicle2 Object) Type))
statements:
(: vehicle (WithTV (Vehicle $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: car (WithTV (Car $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: truck (WithTV (Truck $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: red (WithTV (Red $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: blue (WithTV (Blue $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: faster_than (WithTV (Faster_than $a $b) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: car1 Object)
(: truck1 Object)
(: car1_is_car (WithTV (Car car1) (STV 1.0 1.0)))
(: truck1_is_truck (WithTV (Truck truck1) (STV 1.0 1.0)))
(: car1_is_vehicle (WithTV (Vehicle car1) (STV 1.0 1.0)))
(: truck1_is_vehicle (WithTV (Vehicle truck1) (STV 1.0 1.0)))
(: car1_is_red (WithTV (Red car1) (STV 1.0 1.0)))
(: truck1_is_blue (WithTV (Blue truck1) (STV 1.0 1.0)))
(: not_faster (WithTV (Faster_than car1 truck1) (STV 0.0 0.9)))

input: Every teacher either likes mathematics or teaches science.
types:
(: Person (-> (: $person Object) Type))
(: Teacher (-> (: $teacher Object) Type))
(: Likes_mathematics (-> (: $person Object) Type))
(: Teaches_science (-> (: $teacher Object) Type))
statements:
(: person (WithTV (Person $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: teacher WithTV (Teacher $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: likes_mathematics (WithTV (Likes_mathematics $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: teaches_science (WithTV (Teaches_science $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: teacher_math_science_rule (WithTV (Implication (Teacher $x) (Or (Likes_mathematics $x) (Teaches_science $x))) (STV 0.9 0.9)))

input: If it rains tomorrow, the outdoor concert will be canceled.
types:
(: Rain (-> (: $day Object) Type))
(: Outdoor_concert (-> (: $concert Object) Type))
(: Canceled (-> (: $event Object) Type))
(: Happens_on (-> (: $event Object) (: $day Object) Type))
statements:
(: rain (WithTV (Rain $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: outdoor_concert (WithTV (Outdoor_concert $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: canceled (WithTV (Canceled $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: happens_on (WithTV (Happens_on $a $b) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: tomorrow Object)
(: concert1 Object)
(: concert1_is_outdoor (WithTV (Outdoor_concert concert1) (STV 1.0 1.0)))
(: concert1_on_tomorrow (WithTV (Happens_on concert1 tomorrow) (STV 1.0 1.0)))
(: rain_cancels_concert (WithTV (Implication (Rain tomorrow) (Canceled concert1)) (STV 0.95 0.9)))

input: The Empire State Building is more than 380 meters tall.
types:
(: Building (-> (: $building Object) Type))
(: Name (-> (: $named Object) (: $name String) Type))
(: Height (-> (: $object Object) (: $height Number) Type))
(: Unit (-> (: $object Object) (: $unit String) Type))
(: Greater_than (-> (: $value1 Number) (: $value2 Number) Type))
statements:
(: building (WithTV (Building $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: name (WithTV (Name $a $b) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: height (WithTV (Height $a $b) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: unit (WithTV (Unit $a $b) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: greater_than (WithTV (Greater_than $a $b) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: empire_state Object)
(: empire_state_is_building (WithTV (Building empire_state) (STV 1.0 1.0)))
(: empire_state_named (WithTV (Name empire_state 'Empire State Building') (STV 1.0 1.0)))
(: empire_state_height (WithTV (And (Height empire_state $h) (And (Unit $h 'Meter') (Greater_than $h 380))) (STV 1.0 1.0)))

input: Alice visits her grandmother every Sunday afternoon.
types:
(: Person (-> (: $person Object) Type))
(: Name (-> (: $named Object) (: $name String) Type))
(: Grandmother_of (-> (: $grandmother Object) (: $grandchild Object) Type))
(: Visits (-> (: $visitor Object) (: $visited Object) Type))
(: Sunday (-> (: $day Object) Type))
(: Afternoon (-> (: $timeperiod Object) Type))
statements:
(: person (WithTV (Person $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: name (WithTV (Name $a $b) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: grandmother_of (WithTV (Grandmother_of $a $b) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: visits (WithTV (Visits $a $b) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: sunday (WithTV (Sunday $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: afternoon (WithTV (Afternoon $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: alice Object)
(: grandmother1 Object)
(: alice_named_alice (WithTV (Name alice 'Alice') (STV 1.0 1.0)))
(: alice_is_person (WithTV (Person alice) (STV 1.0 1.0)))
(: grandmother1_is_person (WithTV (Person grandmother1) (STV 1.0 1.0)))
(: grandmother_relation (WithTV (Grandmother_of grandmother1 alice) (STV 1.0 1.0)))
(: alice_visits_grandmother (WithTV (Implication (And (Sunday $x) (Afternoon $x)) (AtTime (Visits alice grandmother1) $x) (STV 0.95 0.9)))

input: If the barometric pressure drops rapidly and dark clouds form, there is an 80% chance it will rain within the next 3 hours.
types:
(: Dark_clouds (-> (: $darkclouds Object) Type))
(: Rain (-> (: $rain Object) Type))
(: Dropping_rapidly (-> (: $object Object) Type))
(: Barometric_pressure (-> (: $presure Object) Type))
(: Within_hours (-> (: $time1 Object) (: $time2 Object) (: $hours Number) Type))
statements:
(: dark_clouds (WithTV (Dark_clouds $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: rain (WithTV (Rain $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: dropping_rapidly (WithTV (Dropping_rapidly $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: barometric_pressure (WithTV (Barometric_pressure $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: within_hours (WithTV (Within_hours $a $b $c) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: weather_prediction (WithTV (Implication 
  (And 
    (Barometric_pressure $bp)
    (And 
      (AtTime (Dropping_rapidly $bp) $time1) 
      (AtTime (Dark_clouds $dc) $time1)
    ) 
  (And 
    (AtTime (Rain $r) $time2)
    (Within_hours $time2 $time1 3)
  )
) (STV 0.8 0.9)))

(: Bright (-> (-> (: $object Object) Type) (-> (: $object Object) Type)))
statements:

(: red(WithTV (Red $a) (STV 0.0001 0.001)))
(: brigh (WithTV (Bright $a) (STV 0.01 0.01)))
(: bobj Object)
(: ballIsBall (WithTV (Ball bobj) (STV 1.0 0.9)))
(: ballIsBrightRed (WithTV ((Bright Red) bobj) (STV 0.9 0.9)))
